views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12.

Adds seconds to your lockscreen clock, change font size of time and date, and moves them!

Configure options from Settings.

Source code available

- Fixes a bug that you give you safe mode on iOS 12.2 or higher - A12/arm64e now supported - More bugs and new features being worked on -Fixes a bug where if you didn't have seconds enabled, and tried to change the font size, it would not work

- Major bug improvements on battery drain and lag while scrolling
- Adds options to change the font size of time and date, with more options to move them
- Adds a option to disable the seconds if you only want to use the other settings
